The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 16 August is 2,857 (330.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 12 August, there were 20 new confirmed cases (2.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 August, there were 23 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 13% (3 fewer cases).
